mapper.update: update customer set customer_pw = #{customer_pw}, customer_name = #{customer_name}, admin = #{admin}, customer_picture = #{customer_picture}, city = #{city}, addr = #{addr} where customer_email = #{customer_email}
mapper.select: select * from store s, store_file f where s.customer_email = #{customer_email} and s.store_number = f.store_number
